name: Piano Simulator (itch) (Misspeld Games)
description:
Do you want to experience the thrill of sitting in a dark space while playing the piano, but all you have is a MIDI keyboard and a computer monitor illuminating your room? Fear no more, for all your wishes will be fulfilled by this piano simulator!

You will need a MIDI keyboard to play the piano at the moment.

This piano simulator is currently in development, if you have any feedback or features you would like to see added please let me know in the discussions below.

Sources:

MidiJack by keijiro

Piano sounds by University of Iowa

Piano Man sheet music by epping8
